guide.title: Settings Guide
guide.subtitle: Overview of the main configuration functionalities

companyProfile.title: Company Profile
companyProfile.description: Configure your company's data that will be used in documents, invoices, and communication with clients. Includes details such as logo, VAT number, address, and bank information.

roleManagement.title: Role and Permission Management
roleManagement.description: Control who can do what in the application by defining custom roles with specific permissions. Each collaborator can have one or more roles that determine their operational capabilities.

workTypes.title: Types of Work and Activities
workTypes.description: These settings define the operational structure of the system. Types of work (e.g., installation, maintenance) can contain different activities (e.g., site inspection, assembly). For each activity, you can define a predefined duration, cost for the company, and rate for the client.

billing.title: Billing
billing.description: Configure the billing system: progressive numbers, prefixes, predefined notes, VAT rates, and all necessary parameters to generate invoices in compliance with regulations.

subscriptionPlans.title: Subscription Plans
subscriptionPlans.description: Manage all subscription plans available for your clients. Configure monthly and annual prices, included functionalities, duration, and set which plans are active.

notifications.title: Notification Management
notifications.description: Configure how and when users receive notifications for new jobs, deadlines, and other activities. You can set up notifications via email or WhatsApp with personalized timings.

webPages.title: Web Pages
webPages.description: Complete management of website pages for both desktop and mobile devices. You can create, modify, and publish pages, set the homepage for each version, and manage the SEO content of each page.

companyProfile.title: Company Profile
companyProfile.description: Manage your company data, logo, tax and banking information

userRoles.title: User Roles
userRoles.description: Define roles that can be assigned to collaborators with relative permissions

businessSectors.title: Business Sectors
businessSectors.description: Manage business sectors available for clients during registration

jobTypes.title: Job Types
jobTypes.description: Configure various job types that the company can perform

activities.title: Activities
activities.description: Manage activities and tasks that can be performed for different job types

invoiceSettings.title: Invoice Settings
invoiceSettings.description: Manage numbering, templates and invoice settings

subscriptionPlans.title: Subscription Plans
subscriptionPlans.description: Manage subscription plans available for clients

webPages.description: Manage website pages for desktop and mobile versions

generalSettings.title: General Settings
generalSettings.description: Configure general application settings such as notifications, language, etc.

clientPlanOverrides.description: Customize plan configurations for specific clients

configurationInfo.title: Plan Configuration Information
configurationInfo.description: From this screen, you can configure in detail the subscription plans for the system users.

features.title: Available Features
features.description: Controls which features are active for each plan and sets eventual limits (e.g., maximum number of clients or collaborators).

pageAccess.title: Page Access
pageAccess.description: Define which pages of the application are accessible and with what permissions (read-only or modify).

visibleFields.title: Visible Fields
visibleFields.description: Configure which fields are visible for each entity (clients, jobs, etc.) based on the subscription plan.

permissions.title: Operational Permissions
permissions.description: Establish which operations (creation, modification, deletion) can be performed by users of each plan.
